snippet.title: Real Anime Situation! 2 OP Movie
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2361760?utm_source=youtubeen

When chronic daydreamer Tooru’s dastardly diary is discovered, classmates old and new won’t give him a moment’s peace! Featuring eye-popping art, intricate animations, and multiple moonstruck heroines, this ’20 Moe Game Awards-winning comedy VN also received its own hit anime adaptation.

Subscribe & Follow Shiravune for our latest news:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/shiravune/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shiravune
Discord: https://discord.gg/qBmrqDy
Website: https://shiravune.com/
